com.lukflug.panelstudio.widget

Class ClosableComponent<S extends IComponent,T extends IComponent>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.component.FocusableComponentProxy<VerticalContainer>
      • com.lukflug.panelstudio.widget.ClosableComponent<S,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - the title component type
    T - the content component type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IComponent, IComponentProxy<VerticalContainer>

    public class ClosableComponent<S extends IComponent,T extends IComponent>
extends FocusableComponentProxy<VerticalContainer>
    A panel that can be opened and closed.

                         IPanelRenderer<U> panelRenderer,
                         boolean focus)
        Creates a generic panel.
        Type Parameters:
        U - the render state type
        Parameters:
        title - the title component of the panel
        content - the content of the panel
        state - the state of this panel
        panelRenderer - the render to use for the overlay of this panel
        open - the toggleable to use for opening and closing the panel
        focus - initial focus state

      • createStaticPopup

        public static <S extends IComponent,T extends IComponent,U> DraggableComponent<FixedComponent<ClosableComponent<ComponentProxy<S>,ScrollBarComponent<U,T>>>> createStaticPopup(S title,
                                                                                                                                                                               T content,
                                                                                                                                                                               java.util.function.Supplier<U> state,
                                                                                                                                                                               Animation animation,
                                                                                                                                                                               RendererTuple<U> renderer,
                                                                                                                                                                               IScrollSize popupSize,
                                                                                                                                                                               IToggleable shown,
                                                                                                                                                                               java.util.function.IntSupplier widthSupplier,
                                                                                                                                                                               boolean savesState,
                                                                                                                                                                               java.lang.String configName,
                                                                                                                                                                               boolean closeOnClick)
        Create a static pop-up.
        Type Parameters:
        S - the title component type
        T - the content component type
        U - the render state type
        Parameters:
        title - the title component
        content - the content component
        state - the render state
        animation - the animation for opening and collapsing
        renderer - the renderer to be used
        popupSize - the scroll behavior
        shown - visibility toggle that can be used to display pop-up
        widthSupplier - supplier for the width of the component
        savesState - whether this panel should save the panel state
        configName - the panel config name
        closeOnClick - true, if pop-up should be closed when mouse is clicked
        Returns:
        a panel containing the pop-up

                                                                                                                                                                                      boolean savesState,
                                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String configName)
        Creates a collapsible and scrollable panel that can also be dragged and implements fixed component.
        Type Parameters:
        S - the title component type
        T - the content component type
        U - the render state type
        Parameters:
        title - the title component
        content - the content component
        state - the render state
        open - the toggleable for opening an closing
        renderer - the renderer to be used
        scrollSize - the scroll behavior
        position - the initial position of the panel
        width - the panel width
        savesState - whether this panel should save the panel state
        configName - the config name of the panel
        Returns:
        a draggable component

      • createDraggableComponent

        public static <S extends IComponent,T extends IComponent,U> DraggableComponent<FixedComponent<ClosableComponent<S,T>>> createDraggableComponent(java.util.function.Supplier<ClosableComponent<S,T>> panel,
                                                                                                                                                java.awt.Point position,
                                                                                                                                                int width,
                                                                                                                                                boolean savesState,
                                                                                                                                                java.lang.String configName)
        Creates a closable component that can also be dragged and implements fixed component.
        Type Parameters:
        S - the title component type
        T - the content component type
        U - the render state type
        Parameters:
        panel - the panel to be wrapped
        position - the initial position of the panel
        width - the panel width
        savesState - whether this panel should save the panel state
        configName - the config name of the panel
        Returns:
        a draggable component containing a closable component
